name: memento (itch) (kaelynmauve)
description:
"Welcome one, welcome all! You have entered Imago's scrolling gallery. Our latest collection includes a set of magical photographs which you can admire from afar or enter. Explore the gallery, explore the exhibits. Who knows what you'll find within?"

An rpg made with GB Studio, Memento is a journey into the world behind photographs. It took me a painstakingly long time to draw the sprites and backgrounds pixel by pixel but I'm glad to announce that the project is finally ready for release!

Launch the game in your browser and press Z to begin. Use the arrow keys to move and Z to interact. There are multiple endings to unlock, so use the floating cameras in-game to capture your progress (i.e. save).

p.s.  After you finish playing, do let me know your thoughts on the plot in the comments section below (without spoilers of course). Thank you for stopping by!

**This game contains dark themes. If you wish to view a list of trigger warnings, highlight the concealed text below. If not, avoid doing so as it may spoil the plot.

Bullying, psychological disorders, suicide.
